steps.text: Iceman, this is N443DF, do you copy?
Iceman, N443DF, weâ€™ll need a full body Type 1 deicing today.
Copy that N443DF you are requesting full body type 1. Please prepare the aircraft for type 1 application.
Iceman, aircraft N443DF ready for deicing. Engines running, APU is off.
Copy that N443DF. Engines are running with APU off, full body type 1. Starting application now.
Go ahead, Iceman, for aircraft N443DF.
Yes N443DF deicing is complete. Post-deicing check complete, personnel and equipment are safely out of the way. Have a safe flight.
Hey, iceman, aircraft N443DF copies. Thank you for your help and stay warm out there!
